lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon and Ashley Battle scored 21 points each to lead the Liberty to an 80-69 W.N.B.A. victory against the expansion Chicago Sky at Madison Square Garden last night.
snippet: Shameka Christon and Ashley Battle scored 21 points each to lead the Liberty to an 80-69 W.N.B.A. victory against the expansion Chicago Sky at Madison Square Garden last night.
